insert into t_sys_order_detail (order_detail_code, order_code, sell_price, good_code, total_number, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version) values
( #{item.orderDetailCode}, #{item.orderCode}, #{item.sellPrice}, #{item.goodCode}, #{item.totalNumber}, 0, #{item.createUser}, now(), #{item.createUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select s.store_code storeCode, u.user_name buyerName, u.tel buyerTel from t_sys_store as s left join t_sys_user as u on s.invite_code = u.invite_code and u.role = 4 and u.is_delete = 0 where s.is_delete = 0 and u.user_code = #{createUser}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_order (order_code, order_state, store_code, buyer_tel, buyer_name, all_number, all_price, is_pay, pay_time, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version) values ( #{orderCode}, 1, #{storeCode}, #{buyerTel}, #{buyerName}, #{allNumber}, #{allPrice}, 2, now(), 0, #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update t_sys_order set order_state = #{orderState}, version = version + 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now() where is_delete = 0 and order_code = #{orderCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select s.store_name, concat(s.province_name, s.downtown_name, s.area_name, s.address) address, o.order_code, o.all_number, o.all_price, o.create_time, o.order_state, o.version, g.good_code, g.good_name, g.sell_price, g.good_introduce, d.total_number, g.pictureUrl from t_sys_order as o left join t_sys_store as s on o.store_code = s.store_code left join t_sys_order_detail as d on o.order_code = d.order_code left join t_sys_goods g on d.good_code = g.good_code where o.is_delete = 0 and o.order_code = #{orderCode}

select o.order_code, o.all_number, o.all_price, o.order_state, g.good_code, g.good_name, g.sell_price, g.good_introduce, d.total_number, g.pictureUrl, o.version from t_sys_order as o left join t_sys_order_detail d on o.order_code = d.order_code left join t_sys_goods as g on d.good_code = g.good_code where o.is_delete = 0
and o.order_state = #{orderState}

select g.good_code goodCode, g.pictureUrl from t_sys_order as o left join t_sys_order_detail as d on o.order_code = d.order_code left join t_sys_goods as g on d.good_code = g.good_code where o.is_delete = 0 and o.order_code = #{orderCode}
